src:
PATRIOTSKI TIKET 06: Otadžbina se voli i sa duplim šansama
Ko sme, taj može! Ko hoće u MOZZARTU može lako do kvote 8,00

06 Nov 2019

Da ne ispadne kako priču o PATRIOTSKOM TIKETU 06 pretvaramo u citat velikog vojskovođe, recimo samo da se otadžbina kladilački može voleti i klupskim bojama, ma koje da ste provinijencije. Crveni, ili crno-beli, tek MOZZART je odlučio da 1X protiv Pevaca na Marakani, odnosno sutrašnji Partizanov X2 tip s Mančester Junajtedom nagradi kovotom 8,00, umesto standardnog koeficijenta 6,21 koliko bi ova tipovanja u dublu vredela da nije najjače moguće ponude kojoj premca nema.


sreda 21.00: (5,20) CRVENA ZVEZDA (3,70) TOTENHEM (1,70)



četvrtak 21.00: (1,40) MANČESTER JUNAJTED (4,50) PARTIZAN (8,50)


Za sve ovo rok za uplatu ističe u 21 čas. DONESITE ODLUKU pre prvog sudijskog zvižduka u Ljutice Bogdana i uživajte u fudbalu. Operativni plan je da svratite do najbližeg MOZZARTA i operateru zatražite davam otkuca  PATRIOTSKI TIKET 06, ili da sve lagano odradite iz svoje fotelje posredstvom mozzartbet.com aplikacije.


* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
PATRIOTIC TICKET 06: The homeland also loves double chances
Who can, that can! Whoever wants in MOZZART can easily reach the odds of 8.00

06 Nov 2019

Lest it turn out that we turn the story of PATRIOT TICKET 06 into a quote from a great warlord, let's just say that the homeland of betting can also be loved by club colors, whatever the provinces. Red, or black and white, only MOZZART has decided to award 1X against Marakana Singers, or tomorrow's Partizan X2 guy with Manchester United, a 8.00 odds, instead of the standard odds of 6.21 how much this double typing would be worth if not the strongest possible offers unmatched.


Wednesday 9pm: (5.20) RED STAR (3.70) TOTENHEM (1.70)



Thursday 9pm: (1.40) Manchester United (4.50) PARTIZAN (8.50)


For all this the payment deadline expires at 9pm. Bring a decision before the first whistle blows to Bogdan Angry and enjoy football. The operational plan is to stop by the nearest MOZZART and ask the operator to give you a PATRIOT TICKET 06, or to work everything out of your armchair using the mozzartbet.com application.


* Odds are subject to change
